SELECT A.MAN_NO ,B.EMPNM AS MAN_NM ,A.RANK_NM ,A.MAN_CD ,A.SKILL_GRD ,A.CAREER ,CONCAT(floor(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(C.STA_DT,'01'),'%Y-%m-%d'),DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')) /12),' 년 ', MOD(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(C.STA_DT,'01'),'%Y-%m-%d'),DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')) , 12),'개월') AS NOW_CAREER ,A.MAIN_SKILL ,A.DUTY_TXT ,A.QLFKS_NM1 ,A.GRD_CD FROM pms_man_pfle_info A LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_emp_info B ON B.EMPNO = A.MAN_NO AND B.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND B.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT BKUP_ID, PRJT_ID, MAN_NO , MIN(STA_DT) AS STA_DT FROM pms_career_lst GROUP BY BKUP_ID, PRJT_ID, MAN_NO) C ON C.MAN_NO = A.MAN_NO AND C.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND C.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID WHERE A.BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}
AND A.SKILL_GRD = #{skill_grd}
AND A.MAIN_SKILL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{main_skill},'%')
AND A.DUTY_TXT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{duty_txt},'%')
AND A.MAN_NO = #{man_no}
AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM pms_cpy_his_lst S WHERE 1 = 1
AND S.COMPANY_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{company_nm},'%')
AND S.MAN_NO = A.MAN_NO AND A.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND A.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID) AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM pms_career_lst S WHERE 1 = 1
AND S.PROJ_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{proj_nm},'%')
AND S.EXE_CPY_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{exe_cpy_nm},'%')
AND S.RLT_SKILL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{car_main_skill},'%')
AND S.RSSB_BNS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{car_duty_txt},'%')
AND S.MAN_NO = A.MAN_NO AND A.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND A.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID) ORDER BY A.MAN_CD, B.EMPNM

SELECT CONCAT('[최종변경일자 : ', DATE_FORMAT(A.DB_CHG_TS, '%Y-%m-%d'), ']') AS LAST_CHG_DT , A.MAN_NO , B.EMPNM AS MAN_NM , A.RANK_NM , A.MAN_CD , CASE WHEN A.BIRTHDAY IS NOT NULL AND A.BIRTHDAY != '' THEN STR_TO_DATE(A.BIRTHDAY, '%Y%m%d') ELSE A.BIRTHDAY END AS BIRTHDAY , CONCAT('만 ', CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%m%d') > SUBSTR(A.BIRTHDAY, 5, 4) THEN CAST(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') AS INT) - CAST(SUBSTR(A.BIRTHDAY, 1, 4) AS INT) ELSE CAST(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y') AS INT) - CAST(SUBSTR(A.BIRTHDAY, 1, 4) AS INT) - 1 END, '세') AS AGE , A.ADDRESS , A.SKILL_GRD , A.CAREER , CONCAT(floor(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(C.STA_DT, '01'), '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')) / 12), ' 년 ', MOD(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(C.STA_DT, '01'), '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')), 12), '개월') AS NOW_CAREER , CASE WHEN A.ENTER_YMD IS NOT NULL AND A.ENTER_YMD != '' THEN STR_TO_DATE(A.ENTER_YMD, '%Y%m%d') ELSE A.ENTER_YMD END AS ENTER_YMD , A.SEX_NM , A.MAIN_SKILL , A.DUTY_TXT , A.CPNO , A.COMPANY_NM , A.GRD_CD , A.SCHOLL_NM1 , CASE WHEN A.GDT_YM1 IS NOT NULL AND A.GDT_YM1 != '' THEN SUBSTR(STR_TO_DATE(A.GDT_YM1, '%Y%m'), 1, 7) ELSE A.GDT_YM1 END AS GDT_YM1 , A.STUDY1 , A.SCHOLL_NM2 , CASE WHEN A.GDT_YM2 IS NOT NULL AND A.GDT_YM2 != '' THEN SUBSTR(STR_TO_DATE(A.GDT_YM2, '%Y%m'), 1, 7) ELSE A.GDT_YM2 END AS GDT_YM2 , A.STUDY2 , A.SCHOLL_NM3 , CASE WHEN A.GDT_YM3 IS NOT NULL AND A.GDT_YM3 != '' THEN SUBSTR(STR_TO_DATE(A.GDT_YM3, '%Y%m'), 1, 7) ELSE A.GDT_YM3 END AS GDT_YM3 , A.STUDY3 , A.QLFKS_NM1 , STR_TO_DATE(A.AQU_YMM1, '%Y%m%d') AS AQU_YMM1 , A.QLFKS_NM2 , STR_TO_DATE(A.AQU_YMM2, '%Y%m%d') AS AQU_YMM2 , A.QLFKS_NM3 , STR_TO_DATE(A.AQU_YMM3, '%Y%m%d') AS AQU_YMM3 , A.QLFKS_NM4 , STR_TO_DATE(A.AQU_YMM4, '%Y%m%d') AS AQU_YMM4 , A.QLFKS_NM5 , STR_TO_DATE(A.AQU_YMM5, '%Y%m%d') AS AQU_YMM5 , A.ATFL_MNG_ID , A.BKUP_ID , A.PRJT_ID , A.NXT_PRJ_NM , D.INP_PRJ_NM , STR_TO_DATE(D.WTH_DT, '%Y%m%d') AS WTH_DT , D.INP_CLS_CD FROM pms_man_pfle_info A LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_emp_info B ON B.EMPNO = A.MAN_NO AND B.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND B.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT BKUP_ID, PRJT_ID, MAN_NO, MIN(STA_DT) AS STA_DT FROM pms_career_lst GROUP BY BKUP_ID, PRJT_ID, MAN_NO) C ON C.MAN_NO = A.MAN_NO AND C.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND C.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN pms_inp_mnp_stt D ON D.EMPNO = A.MAN_NO AND D.PRJT_ID = A.PRJT_ID AND D.BKUP_ID = A.BKUP_ID WHERE A.BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.MAN_NO = #{man_no}

SELECT A.COMPANY_NM , CASE WHEN A.ENTER_DT IS NOT NULL AND A.ENTER_DT != '' THEN SUBSTR(STR_TO_DATE(A.ENTER_DT, '%Y%m'), 1, 7) ELSE A.ENTER_DT END AS ENTER_DT , CASE WHEN A.RSNT_DT IS NOT NULL AND A.RSNT_DT != '' AND A.RSNT_DT != '현재' THEN SUBSTR(STR_TO_DATE(A.RSNT_DT, '%Y%m'), 1, 7) ELSE A.RSNT_DT END AS RSNT_DT , A.RSSB_BNS , A.RMRK , A.BKUP_ID , A.PRJT_ID , A.MAN_NO , A.SQNO FROM pms_cpy_his_lst A WHERE A.BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.MAN_NO = #{man_no} ORDER BY A.ENTER_DT DESC

SELECT A.EXE_CPY_NM , CASE WHEN A.STA_DT IS NOT NULL AND A.STA_DT != '' THEN SUBSTR(STR_TO_DATE(A.STA_DT, '%Y%m'), 1, 7) ELSE A.STA_DT END AS STA_DT , CASE WHEN A.END_DT IS NOT NULL AND A.END_DT != '' AND A.END_DT != '현재' THEN SUBSTR(STR_TO_DATE(A.END_DT, '%Y%m'), 1, 7) ELSE A.END_DT END AS END_DT , A.PROJ_NM , A.RSSB_BNS , A.DUTY_TXT , A.USE_OS , A.RLT_SKILL , A.BKUP_ID , A.PRJT_ID , A.MAN_NO , A.SQNO FROM pms_career_lst A WHERE A.BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND A.PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND A.MAN_NO = #{man_no} ORDER BY A.STA_DT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pms_cpy_his_lst ( BKUP_ID , PRJT_ID , MAN_NO , SQNO , COMPANY_NM , ENTER_DT , RSNT_DT , RSSB_BNS , RMRK , OPR_NO , DB_CHG_TS) VALUES ( '0000000000' , #{prjt_id} /*프로젝트ID*/ , #{man_no} , (SELECT NVL(MAX(SQNO) + 1, 1) AS SQNO FROM pms_cpy_his_lst ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND MAN_NO = #{man_no}) , #{company_nm} , REPLACE(#{enter_dt}, '-', '') , REPLACE(#{rsnt_dt}, '-', '') , #{rssb_bns} , #{rmrk} , #{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ )

INSERT INTO pms_career_lst ( BKUP_ID , PRJT_ID , MAN_NO , SQNO , EXE_CPY_NM , STA_DT , END_DT , PROJ_NM , RSSB_BNS , DUTY_TXT , USE_OS , RLT_SKILL , OPR_NO , DB_CHG_TS) VALUES ( '0000000000' , #{prjt_id} /*프로젝트ID*/ , #{man_no} , (SELECT NVL(MAX(SQNO) + 1, 1) AS SQNO FROM pms_career_lst ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND MAN_NO = #{man_no}) , #{exe_cpy_nm} , REPLACE(#{sta_dt}, '-', '') , REPLACE(#{end_dt}, '-', '') , #{proj_nm} , #{rssb_bns} , #{duty_txt} , #{use_os} , #{rlt_skill} , #{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ )
